thread.title: Thousands attend Jersey cider festival
thread.title_full: Thousands attend Jersey cider festival | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Thousands attend Jersey cider festival
text:
Organisers of a cider festival this weekend say they have been delighted with the turn out.
La Faîs’sie d’Cidre at Hamptonne Country Life Museum saw 1,600 people at the event yesterday, and even more are thought to have attended today.
Traditional apple crushing was the main feature of the festival, as well as live entertainment, including Morris dancers.
It's just been an amazing, amazing event. Cider-making is such a rich part of Jersey's history.
– Nicky Lucas, Jersey Heritage Last updated Sun 18 Oct 2015 Entertainment Jersey
